p: The docking results using rhoifolin as a ligand were −9.5 and −8.2 for S protein and M pro, respectively. Rhoifolin is a flavone that was first discovered in the fresh leaves of Rhus succedanea in 1952 [ 122]. Besides, this compound was also found in Citrus grandis [ 123]. The result of rhoifolin docking on S protein was −9.5 and M pro was −8.2. The rhoifolin binding score for SARS-CoV 3CL pro shows a value of −9.565 [ 31].
